name: Gill Lapis, the Primogenitor
text:
When this card enters your field, you may search your main deck for a card named "Pitch Black Moon" and put it into your field. Then shuffle your main deck.
M: Cancel target activate ability.
B1: Target J/resonator gains [-200/-200] until end of turn.
God's Art [Space-Time Control] BM2: Search your opponent's main deck for a resonator, regalia, and/or [Addition:Field] and put them into your field. The your opponent shuffles their main deck. (Play God's Art [Space-Time Control] only once per game.)
